sentences.sContent: More than five-thousand high school students have been expelled for cheating.
sentences.sCn: 五千多名中学生因考试作弊而被开除。

sentences.sContent: Foreign priests were expelled from the country.

remMethod.val: ex(出) ＋ pel(驱动， 推) → 驱逐

trans.tranOther: to officially force someone to leave a school or organization
